ai-tika-s0401t14:57_6: what is called ‘a harmful’? It isn’t proper for you to ask about what has not been unfaithful.
ai-tika-s0401t14:57_7: if he is not able to obtain (them) by a regular meal invitations in the morning.
ai-tika-s0401t14:57_8: falternatively, and uses food for the sake of a meal.
ai-tika-s0401t14:57_9: it is said to be the best of the best (livings), not to be shown by the greatest of the life, for the restraint of corruptions.
ai-tika-s0401t14:57_10: For the wheel-turning monarch’s nutriment is solid food for the rest of the Four Great Kings, so I can ensure to them.
ai-tika-s0401t14:58_0: gaining fruit on the ascetic life,
ai-tika-s0401t14:58_1: the four names of the Dhamma is a cause of (good) things, he gave the fruit of taste, the deathless, the lord of the deathless, and the deathless.
ai-tika-s0401t14:59_0: The fourth section for recitation is finished.
